Module dunbar.c482pa
Package dunbar.c482pa.Controllers

Class AddProductWindowController

java.lang.Object
dunbar.c482pa.Controllers.AddProductWindowController
All Implemented Interfaces:
javafx.fxml.Initializable
public class AddProductWindowController extends Object implements javafx.fxml.Initializable
The AddProductWindowController controls the interface used to add new products to the Inventory. It includes methods for associating a part with the new Product. The Initializable interface is implemented to populate a table of parts that can be associated with the product, and to automatically generate a unique product ID.

    • initialize

      public void initialize(URL url, ResourceBundle resourceBundle)
      Populates the part table and generates a unique Product ID when the window is loaded.
      Specified by:
      initialize in interface javafx.fxml.Initializable
      Parameters:
      url - The location used to resolve relative paths for the root object, or null if the location is not known.

    • onActionAddAssociatedPart

      void onActionAddAssociatedPart(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Associates a Part with the Product when the Add part button is pressed. Adds the selected Part object to the Product's associatedParts observable list when the Add button is pressed.
      Parameters:
      event - Event generated by pressing the Add button

    • onActionRemoveAssociatedPart

      void onActionRemoveAssociatedPart(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Disassociates a Part from the Product when the Remove Associated Part button is pressed. Removes the selected part from the Product's associatedParts observable list when the Remove Associated Parts button is pressed.
      Parameters:
      event - Event generated by pressing the Remove Associated Parts button

    • onActionSearchParts

      void onActionSearchParts(javafx.scene.input.KeyEvent event)
      Implements search and filtering functionality for the part table. Every time a key is pressed in the part search text box, runs the appropriate Inventory lookupPart() method based on the type of input (integer vs string) then filters the part table contents accordingly.
      Parameters:
      event - Event generated by typing in the part search text box

    • onActionReturnToMain

      void onActionReturnToMain(javafx.event.ActionEvent event) throws IOException
      Returns to the Main window when the cancel button is pressed.
      Parameters:
      event - Event generated by pressing the cancel button
      Throws:
      IOException

    • onActionSaveAndReturn

      void onActionSaveAndReturn(javafx.event.ActionEvent event)
      Saves the new product and returns to the main window when the Save button is pressed. Generates a new Product object based off of the values in the text fields and passes them to the relevant constructor, then adds the new product to the Inventory allProducts list.
      Parameters:
      event - Event generated by pressing the Save button
